document.full_text: in the pre-dawn hours on tuesday, about two dozen union army re-enactors raised a 33-star american flag over fort sumter in south carolina's charleston harbor.
document.title: first shots mark 150 years since start of civil war
lines_and_colors: in the pre-dawn hours on tuesday, about two dozen union army re-enactors raised a 33-star american flag over fort sumter in south carolina's charleston harbor.
